events.message: The customer reported an auto collision that occurred downtown on May 9th, resulting in damages to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the provided accident description and vehicle damage details.
An agent was assigned to handle the case and will contact the customer for further information regarding the car collision.
Acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured the customer that the assessment will begin promptly.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver's license to proceed with claim investigation.
Received all requested documents from the customer including photos, police report, and proof of insurance.
Initiated investigation into the collision circumstances and damage extent based on submitted evidence and police report.
Completed the investigation confirming the customer was not at fault and damage estimate aligns with reported impact.
Proposed a settlement offer covering the repair costs and replacement of damaged parts for the auto accident claim.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for smooth communication.
Claim has been approved by the insurance company, ready to proceed with issuing the payment to the customer.
The payment for the agreed settlement amount was issued to the customerâ€™s account without delay.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful payment and customer confirmation.
All case files and correspondence related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
